dcterms:description: The DirLab dataset consists of 10 4D CTs of the thoracic region, each containing 10 3D CTs with manually set reference landmarks for registration evaluation.
dcterms:title: DirLab

dcterms:creator: J. Vandemeulebroucke
S. Rit
J. Kybic
P. Clarysse
D. Sarrut
dcterms:description: The Popi dataset includes six 4D CTs consisting of 10 3D CTs each, showing the lung region and containing landmarks for registration evaluation.
dcterms:title: Popi

dcterms:creator: P. Radau
Y. Lu
K. Connelly
G. Paul
A. Dick
G. Wright
dcterms:description: The Sunnybrook dataset contains cardiac MRI datasets used for training data in the MICCAI left ventricle segmentation challenge, including cine-MRI images from patients with different pathologies and expert-drawn contours for validation.
dcterms:title: Sunnybrook
